QuestData.Title: Amulet of Rukhmar: The First Key
QuestData.Description:
The Arakkoa research points to three "keys" that need to be activated in order to use the Apexis device. The first is located in Skettis. The text mentioning it reads:
"The first key is kept in the high reaches of upper Skettis. It lay where the dead can protect it from the talons of the unwanted."
QuestData.LogDescription: Find and activate the first key to the Apexis device.

Objectives.Objective: Follow the clue to activate the first key
